ygData.subject: From Brad - New zones in EQ
ygData.msgSnippet: We will have 3 NEW zones in EQ, EXCLUDING the 3 planes (hate, sky, fear).  And all these are BEFORE the new expansion. ;) Brad McQuaid
ygData.messageBody:
We will have 3 NEW zones in EQ, EXCLUDING the 3 planes (hate, sky, fear). And all these are BEFORE the new expansion.

;)


Brad McQuaid <bmcquaid@...> wrote in message <37DC2BE8.BF7F5200@...>...
> Yes, we are, as well as activating the Plane of Hate, the Plane of Sky, and
> itemizing Kedge Keep.
>
> Lawless wrote:
>
> > What 3 new zones? Are the adding new zones before the expansion?
> >
> > Tim Lamb wrote:
> > >
> > > But still refuses to add new servers at a rate to reduce the number of
> > > people on this already overcrowded game.
> > >
> > > I guess we only have to wait 8 MORE MONTHS until the expansion to get a
> > > decent number of new zones. (sorry, but the 3 new zones will not help too
> > > much with overcrowding). By expansion, each server will probably have 2500
> > > people on them...
> > >
> > > Ever see that old star trek episode where a planet has so many people on it,
> > > they have no room to sit down? That's what EQ is starting to feel like!
>
> --
>
> ---------------------------------------------
> Brad McQuaid
> Producer, EverQuest www.everquest.com
> Vice President, Verant Interactive Inc.
> ---------------------------------------------
>
>
